_header: In the old law in that life a man hight Ysakar
_description: The Children of St. Anne by her three husbands — in monorhyming quatrains

BodTan407.First Lines:
In the olde lawe in that lyff a man hyght ysakarNasavath was his
                    wyff Namyd so ȝar…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…Of faderys husbondys and of sunnys the kynred fayre in
                    fereSaynt Anne shyld vs fro sorow and woo an alle þat her wurshyp
                    here
